item.title: A noob's first command? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Itz_Alister_Yo Itz Alister Yo
item.description:
@Itz_Alister_Yo wrote:

Hey guys umm I’m a noob to coding, and I made this command. Can somebody tell me if it looks legit enough and if it works maybe? Hell, try it out on your server. If it DOES work and you decide to use it, please at least give me some credit. I really want to get into coding more, so if somebody here sees an error, feel free to point it out. Criticism is good! Thanks (:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("thekinghasarrived") && c.playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; int randomchat = Misc.random(2); if (randomchat == 0) { c2.forcedChat("Welcome back, Alister! Lookin' good, bro!"); c2.startAnimation(52057); }
